plot: An apprentice swordsman, studying under his master, becomes frustrated with his hard lessons, and decides to teach the master a lesson of his own.
title: By the Sword
plot_es: An apprentice swordsman, studying under his master, becomes frustrated with his hard lessons, and decides to teach the master a lesson of his own.
plot_en: An apprentice swordsman, studying under his master, becomes frustrated with his hard lessons, and decides to teach the master a lesson of his own.
